name: Contrast (itch) (Gaming Project at VT)
description:
Contrast is a puzzle platformer where you shift between light and dark dimensions. Traveling to different dimensions will change object's properties. Help Gizmo get to the end to see what's at the end of this dimension jumping journey!

Controls: A D - Move Space - Jump
Left Shift - Switch Dimensions
Team members: Keagan Bell, Kevin Flint, Matthew Jaffe, Maria Jernigan, John Torres
